# **About**

I am Wallstreet Petrus-Nihi (\[GitHub\](https://github.com/Wallstreet111)), a data enthusiast with a passion for uncovering insights from data. Feel free to contact me at \[moyopetrus\@gmail.com\](mailto:moyopetrus\@gmail.com).
